creator: Tesco Stores
descriptionHtml:
Clubcard TESCO Slovakia

Do you like shopping at Tesco stores? Make your shopping even easier and more convenient with the Tesco Clubcard app.
- It takes just a few seconds to view the progress of your collected points.
- Quickly and conveniently access your coupons and vouchers, which you can redeem right from your mobile phone.

Clubcard helps you save more. Join now!
How does the Clubcard work? Simply and conveniently: For every purchase in the Tesco stores, you will earn points that will be credited to your Clubcard account. For every 150 Clubcard points you will receive a money-off voucher worth 1.50 € that you can use as a discount on your next purchase. You can collect points on your Clubcard as well as using the app.
Let your phone be really smart!
Don't miss any special offer. With the Tesco Clubcard app you’ll have at your disposal member’s promo events, coupons and money-off vouchers and many other surprises at any time and all in one place. Say goodbye to complicated searches or waiting for discounts.
The Clubcard Tesco app makes it easy to keep track of your accumulated points and to view vouchers collected during previous purchases. This information is automatically updated. It's now easier and faster to redeem coupons and vouchers directly via the app! When you go shopping, you can even leave your Clubcard at home: when checking out, just scan your card code directly from your mobile!
Tip: When scanning the code, increase the brightness on your mobile phone to make sure it works the first time.
In addition, thanks to the application you will:
- receive extra coupons exclusively as the app user,
- receive special benefits (such as a birthday voucher, e-stamps, member promotions and leaflets in your mobile),
- manage all your personal information (changes of address, shopping preferences, email),
- easily find your nearest Tesco store.
Shopping at Tesco with ease
Also, you can see in the app the opening hours of each Tesco store in the vicinity plus information about current special offers and discounts. Download the Clubcard app to your mobile today and make your next purchase easy!
Tip: Let us protect the environment. Using the app reduces the need of printing paper!
The application is available for FREE for smartphones running under Android 5.0 and higher

TIP: Don’t miss a special offer for Clubcard members using the Clubcard mobile app. Kick off on 22nd January 2020!
descriptionShort: Take all the benefits of Clubcard with you on your phone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Update to the new version of Clubcard. Brings minor improvements and bug fixes. Thank you for being a Clubcard member.

title: Clubcard Tesco Slovakia

creator: Tesco Stores
descriptionHtml:
Clubcard TESCO Slovakia

Do you like shopping at Tesco stores? Make your shopping even easier and more convenient with the Tesco Clubcard app.
- It takes just a few seconds to view the progress of your collected points.
- Quickly and conveniently access your coupons and vouchers, which you can redeem right from your mobile phone.

Clubcard helps you save more. Join now!
How does the Clubcard work? Simply and conveniently: For every purchase in the Tesco stores, you will earn points that will be credited to your Clubcard account. For every 150 Clubcard points you will receive a money-off voucher worth 1.50 € that you can use as a discount on your next purchase. You can collect points on your Clubcard as well as using the app.
Let your phone be really smart!
Don't miss any special offer. With the Tesco Clubcard app you’ll have at your disposal member’s promo events, coupons and money-off vouchers and many other surprises at any time and all in one place. Say goodbye to complicated searches or waiting for discounts.
The Clubcard Tesco app makes it easy to keep track of your accumulated points and to view vouchers collected during previous purchases. This information is automatically updated. It's now easier and faster to redeem coupons and vouchers directly via the app! When you go shopping, you can even leave your Clubcard at home: when checking out, just scan your card code directly from your mobile!
Tip: When scanning the code, increase the brightness on your mobile phone to make sure it works the first time.
In addition, thanks to the application you will:
- receive extra coupons exclusively as the app user,
- receive special benefits (such as a birthday voucher, e-stamps, member promotions and leaflets in your mobile),
- manage all your personal information (changes of address, shopping preferences, email),
- easily find your nearest Tesco store.
Shopping at Tesco with ease
Also, you can see in the app the opening hours of each Tesco store in the vicinity plus information about current special offers and discounts. Download the Clubcard app to your mobile today and make your next purchase easy!
Tip: Let us protect the environment. Using the app reduces the need of printing paper!
The application is available for FREE for smartphones running under Android 5.0 and higher

title: Clubcard Tesco Slovakia

creator: Tesco Stores
descriptionHtml:
Clubcard TESCO Slovakia

Do you like shopping at Tesco stores? Make your shopping even easier and more convenient with the Tesco Clubcard app.
- It takes just a few seconds to view the progress of your collected points.
- Quickly and conveniently access your coupons and vouchers, which you can redeem right from your mobile phone.

Clubcard helps you save more. Join now!
How does the Clubcard work? Simply and conveniently: For every purchase in the Tesco stores, you will earn points that will be credited to your Clubcard account. For every 150 Clubcard points you will receive a money-off voucher worth 1.50 € that you can use as a discount on your next purchase. You can collect points on your Clubcard as well as using the app.
Let your phone be really smart!
Don't miss any special offer. With the Tesco Clubcard app you’ll have at your disposal member’s promo events, coupons and money-off vouchers and many other surprises at any time and all in one place. Say goodbye to complicated searches or waiting for discounts.
The Clubcard Tesco app makes it easy to keep track of your accumulated points and to view vouchers collected during previous purchases. This information is automatically updated. It's now easier and faster to redeem coupons and vouchers directly via the app! When you go shopping, you can even leave your Clubcard at home: when checking out, just scan your card code directly from your mobile!
Tip: When scanning the code, increase the brightness on your mobile phone to make sure it works the first time.
In addition, thanks to the application you will:
- receive extra coupons exclusively as the app user,
- receive special benefits (such as a birthday voucher, e-stamps, member promotions and leaflets in your mobile),
- manage all your personal information (changes of address, shopping preferences, email),
- easily find your nearest Tesco store.
Shopping at Tesco with ease
Also, you can see in the app the opening hours of each Tesco store in the vicinity plus information about current special offers and discounts. Download the Clubcard app to your mobile today and make your next purchase easy!
Tip: Let us protect the environment. Using the app reduces the need of printing paper!

descriptionHtml:
Clubcard TESCO Slovakia

Do you like shopping at Tesco stores? Make your shopping even easier and more convenient with the Tesco Clubcard app.
- It takes just a few seconds to view the progress of your collected points.
- Quickly and conveniently access your coupons and vouchers, which you can redeem right from your mobile phone.

Clubcard helps you save more. Join now!
How does the Clubcard work? Simply and conveniently: For every purchase in the Tesco stores, you will earn points that will be credited to your Clubcard account. For every 150 Clubcard points you will receive a money-off voucher worth 1.50 € that you can use as a discount on your next purchase. You can collect points on your Clubcard as well as using the app.
Let your phone be really smart!
Don't miss any special offer. With the Tesco Clubcard app you’ll have at your disposal member’s promo events, coupons and money-off vouchers and many other surprises at any time and all in one place. Say goodbye to complicated searches or waiting for discounts.
The Clubcard Tesco app makes it easy to keep track of your accumulated points and to view vouchers collected during previous purchases. This information is automatically updated. It's now easier and faster to redeem coupons and vouchers directly via the app! When you go shopping, you can even leave your Clubcard at home: when checking out, just scan your card code directly from your mobile!
Tip: When scanning the code, increase the brightness on your mobile phone to make sure it works the first time.
In addition, thanks to the application you will:
- receive extra coupons exclusively as the app user,
- receive special benefits (such as a birthday voucher, e-stamps, member promotions and leaflets in your mobile),
- manage all your personal information (changes of address, shopping preferences, email),
- easily find your nearest Tesco store.
Shopping at Tesco with ease
Also, you can see in the app the opening hours of each Tesco store in the vicinity plus information about current special offers and discounts. Download the Clubcard app to your mobile today and make your next purchase easy!
Tip: Let us protect the environment. Using the app reduces the need of printing paper!
The application is available for FREE for smartphones running under Android 5.0 and higher

TIP: Don’t miss a special offer for Clubcard members using the Clubcard mobile app. Kick off on 22nd January 2020!
descriptionShort: Take all the benefits of Clubcard with you on your phone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With this update, we are bringing more benefits to our loyal customers
alongside minor improvements and bug fixes. The Clubcard app manages everything you may need for shopping with Tesco Clubcard. If you don't have an account you can create one in minutes and start using the app to get vouchers, coupons, and special offers. Thank you for being a Clubcard member.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update is all about fixes under the hood to make sure the app keeps running smoothly:
No more updates will be needed when launching a new campaign.
We have consolidated our consents in one page so you can control how you interact with us at a glance!
If you are one of the users without an account, we will explain what you are missing out! 
We updated our code libraries.
All of this to make it easier for you to access your Clubcard benefits.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update is all about fixes under the hood to make sure the app keeps running smoothly:
Wondering where your points went during last time we converted them into vouchers? No worries, we will inform you of this in the future.
If you don't want to be part of Clubcard anymore, you will find an easy way to request the deletion of your account.
We improved the overall user experience with minor updates to our design.
All of this to make it easier for you to access your Clubcard benefits.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update is all about some work under the hood preparing for some exciting activities you will be able to enjoy soon.
In light to give you a more personalized experience, we had to limit the amount of languages supported.
We improved the app performance by fixing some minor bugs and updating slightly our design.
Stay tuned to ensure you won't miss incredible promotions coming to your device very soon!
All of this to make it easier for you to access your Clubcard benefits.

title: Clubcard Tesco Slovakia

creator: Tesco Stores
descriptionHtml:
Clubcard Tesco Slovakia

What are the extra benefits of Clubcard Application?
- Every month you receive extra discount coupons for your own personal favourite products
- Sometimes we surprise you with seasonal or weekend discount coupons
- You can take part in exclusive in App campaigns, such as electronic stamps collecting to gain discount for your next shopping or for special collectible products, enjoy one of our Advent Calendars where you have a surprise discount every day or take part in App competitions and win interesting prizes

What else can you find in application?
- progress of your collected points for your money vouchers
- access your coupons and vouchers, which you can redeem right from your mobile phone
- receive special discount coupon for your birthday
- your Statement (should you reach the minimum number of points in collection period – more in section How Clubcard works)
- daily Tesco promotional offers which you can filter by categories you like
- weekly Tesco leaflets
- Tesco magazines for free
- find your nearest store and view its opening times
- manage your personal data (address, mailing preferences, email)
- control the way you receive your statement (say NO to paper and receive your quarterly statement into App & e-mail only)

It is now easier than ever to register into the Clubcard scheme directly from the Application.
You can choose between the new registration for new Clubcard members or connect your account if you are existing Clubcard member with plastic card or Tesco Online customer.

How does Clubcard work?
For every purchase in Tesco stores, you will earn points that will be credited to your account. For every 1€ you will get 1 Clubcard point. Once you have earned at least 150 Clubcard points during a designated period of time (4 times per year) you will receive Clubcard money vouchers that you can use as a discount on your next purchase. And don’t worry, if you don’t collect enough points in one collection period, we don’t delete them, we transfer them to the next period to give you the chance to collect enough for your next discount.

Download the Clubcard App to your mobile today and make your next purchase easy!
The Application is available for FREE for all smartphones.
descriptionShort: Take all the benefits of Clubcard with you on your phone.

All of this to make it easier for you to access your Clubcard benefits.

title: Clubcard Tesco Slovakia

creator: Tesco Stores
descriptionHtml:
Clubcard Tesco Slovakia

What are the extra benefits of Clubcard Application?
- Every month you receive extra discount coupons for your own personal favourite products
- Sometimes we surprise you with seasonal or weekend discount coupons
- You can take part in exclusive in App campaigns, such as electronic stamps collecting to gain discount for your next shopping or for special collectible products, enjoy one of our Advent Calendars where you have a surprise discount every day or take part in App competitions and win interesting prizes

What else can you find in application?
- progress of your collected points for your money vouchers
- access your coupons and vouchers, which you can redeem right from your mobile phone
- receive special discount coupon for your birthday
- your Statement (should you reach the minimum number of points in collection period – more in section How Clubcard works)
- daily Tesco promotional offers which you can filter by categories you like
- weekly Tesco leaflets
- Tesco magazines for free
- find your nearest store and view its opening times
- manage your personal data (address, mailing preferences, email)
- control the way you receive your statement (say NO to paper and receive your quarterly statement into App & e-mail only)

It is now easier than ever to register into the Clubcard scheme directly from the Application.
You can choose between the new registration for new Clubcard members or connect your account if you are existing Clubcard member with plastic card or Tesco Online customer.

How does Clubcard work?
For every purchase in Tesco stores, you will earn points that will be credited to your account. For every 1€ you will get 1 Clubcard point. Once you have earned at least 150 Clubcard points during a designated period of time (4 times per year) you will receive Clubcard money vouchers that you can use as a discount on your next purchase. And don’t worry, if you don’t collect enough points in one collection period, we don’t delete them, we transfer them to the next period to give you the chance to collect enough for your next discount.

Download the Clubcard App to your mobile today and make your next purchase easy!
The Application is available for FREE for all smartphones.
descriptionShort: Take all the benefits of Clubcard with you on your phone.

With this update, our application provides an even better user experience to access Clubcard benefits more easily:

- Updated More section
- Updated Promotions section, so much more easier to browse Leaflets

title: Clubcard Tesco Slovakia

creator: Tesco Stores
descriptionHtml:
Clubcard Tesco Slovakia

Do you like shopping at Tesco stores? Clubcard helps you save. Join now!

With all purchases, you earn points (1 for every 1 €) that are credited to your Clubcard account. Once you have earned at least 150 points, you can transfer it to a voucher, which you can redeem the next time you shop. You can track changes to your points in your Clubcard account.

Make your shopping more convenient with the Tesco Clubcard app.
- Quickly and conveniently access your coupons and vouchers, which you can redeem right from your mobile phone.
- Tesco store locator, opening hours of the stores are available in the app
- just like leaflet and magazines

Make it more rewarding with the Tesco Clubcard app.

With Clubcard Tesco app you’ll have at your disposal member’s promo events, competitions and many other surprises at any time and all in one place.

When you go shopping, you can even leave your Clubcard at home: at checking out, just scan your card code directly from your mobile!


The app is FREE to download for smartphones with the following operating systems:
• iOS 11.0 and newer
descriptionShort: Take all the benefits of Clubcard with you on your phone.

With all purchases, you earn points (1 for every 1 €) that are credited to your Clubcard account. Once you have earned at least 150 points, you can transfer it to a voucher, which you can redeem the next time you shop. You can track changes to your points in your Clubcard account.

Make your shopping more convenient with the Tesco Clubcard app.
- Quickly and conveniently access your coupons and vouchers, which you can redeem right from your mobile phone.
- Tesco store locator, opening hours of the stores are available in the app
- just like leaflet and magazines

Make it more rewarding with the Tesco Clubcard app.

With Clubcard Tesco app you’ll have at your disposal member’s promo events, competitions and many other surprises at any time and all in one place.

When you go shopping, you can even leave your Clubcard at home: at checking out, just scan your card code directly from your mobile!


The app is FREE to download for smartphones with the following operating systems:
• Android 5.0 and newer
descriptionShort: Take all the benefits of Clubcard with you on your phone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Tato aktualizace přináší opravu několika skrytých chyb, aby byl přístup ke všem Vašim Clubcard odměnám co nejjednodušší.
